verses.kjv: Hear the word of the LORD, ye children of Israel: for the LORD hath a controversy with the inhabitants of the land, because there is no truth, nor mercy, nor knowledge of God in the land.
verses.ct: Listen to the message of the LORD, people of Israel! The LORD has a case against everyone living in this land, because there is no faithfulness, no mercy, and no knowledge of God in the land.

verses.kjv: By swearing, and lying, and killing, and stealing, and committing adultery, they break out, and blood toucheth blood.
verses.ct: There is nothing but cursing, lying, murder, theft, and adultery. They break every limit, and one act of bloodshed follows another.

verses.kjv: Therefore shall the land mourn, and every one that dwelleth therein shall languish, with the beasts of the field, and with the fowls of heaven; yea, the fishes of the sea also shall be taken away.
verses.ct: Because of this, the land will dry up, and everyone living in it will waste away, along with the wild animals and the birds of the heavens. Even the fish in the sea will disappear.

verses.kjv: Yet let no man strive, nor reprove another: for thy people are as they that strive with the priest.
verses.ct: But no one should point fingers or accuse anyone else, because your people are like those who argue against the priest himself.

verses.kjv: Therefore shalt thou fall in the day, and the prophet also shall fall with thee in the night, and I will destroy thy mother.
verses.ct: So you will stumble during the day, and the prophet will stumble with you at night, and I will destroy your motherland.

verses.kjv: My people are destroyed for lack of knowledge: because thou hast rejected knowledge, I will also reject thee, that thou shalt be no priest to me: seeing thou hast forgotten the law of thy God, I will also forget thy children.
verses.ct: My people are destroyed because they lack knowledge. Since you have rejected knowledge, I will reject you from serving as my priest. Since you have forgotten the law of your God, I will also forget your children.

verses.kjv: As they were increased, so they sinned against me: therefore will I change their glory into shame.
verses.ct: The more they multiplied, the more they sinned against me. So I will turn their honor into disgrace.

verses.kjv: They eat up the sin of my people, and they set their heart on their iniquity.
verses.ct: They feed on the sin offerings of my people, and they eagerly desire their wrongdoing.

verses.kjv: And there shall be, like people, like priest: and I will punish them for their ways, and reward them their doings.
verses.ct: It will be the same for the people as for the priest — I will punish them for their behavior and repay them for what they have done.

verses.kjv: For they shall eat, and not have enough: they shall commit whoredom, and shall not increase: because they have left off to take heed to the LORD.
verses.ct: They will eat but never be satisfied. They will pursue prostitution but will not grow in number, because they have abandoned the LORD.

verses.kjv: Whoredom and wine and new wine take away the heart.
verses.ct: Prostitution, old wine, and new wine rob people of their understanding.

verses.kjv: My people ask counsel at their stocks, and their staff declareth unto them: for the spirit of whoredoms hath caused them to err, and they have gone a whoring from under their God.
verses.ct: My people consult their wooden idols, and they look to a stick for answers. A spirit of prostitution has led them astray, and they have been unfaithful to their God.

verses.kjv: They sacrifice upon the tops of the mountains, and burn incense upon the hills, under oaks and poplars and elms, because the shadow thereof is good: therefore your daughters shall commit whoredom, and your spouses shall commit adultery.
verses.ct: They offer sacrifices on the mountaintops and burn incense on the hills, under oak trees, poplar trees, and elm trees, because the shade is pleasant. That is why your daughters turn to prostitution and your daughters-in-law commit adultery.

verses.kjv: I will not punish your daughters when they commit whoredom, nor your spouses when they commit adultery: for themselves are separated with whores, and they sacrifice with harlots: therefore the people that doth not understand shall fall.
verses.ct: I will not punish your daughters when they turn to prostitution, or your daughters-in-law when they commit adultery, because the men themselves go off with prostitutes and offer sacrifices alongside temple prostitutes. A people without understanding will be ruined.

verses.kjv: Though thou, Israel, play the harlot, yet let not Judah offend; and come not ye unto Gilgal, neither go ye up to Bethaven, nor swear, The LORD liveth.
verses.ct: Even though you, Israel, act like a prostitute, don't let Judah become guilty too. Don't go to Gilgal, don't travel up to Beth-aven, and don't take oaths saying, 'As the LORD lives.'

verses.kjv: For Israel slideth back as a backsliding heifer: now the LORD will feed them as a lamb in a large place.
verses.ct: Israel is as stubborn as a stubborn cow. How can the LORD now pasture them like a lamb in an open meadow?

verses.kjv: Ephraim is joined to idols: let him alone.
verses.ct: Ephraim is bound to idols — leave him alone.

verses.kjv: Their drink is sour: they have committed whoredom continually: her rulers with shame do love, Give ye.
verses.ct: When their drinking is finished, they give themselves to prostitution without end. Their rulers passionately love their shameful ways.

verses.kjv: The wind hath bound her up in her wings, and they shall be ashamed because of their sacrifices.
verses.ct: A wind has wrapped them up in its force, and they will be put to shame because of their sacrifices.
